marklogic.body: REally like the second gown - yes it's gray but it fits well, flatters her figure, and has some great design elements. Really like that overlay at the top. And her hair is well done.Â She still looks a bit pale that's not the end of the world - she does have some lip color and her Blush is improved - just want a bit more to bring out the eyes.Â The other 2 outfits are ok nothing dreadful and nothing to write home about.Â I'm just Glad she is looking happier these days and getting more comfortable with all the attention.
